### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Up06CryWQpE](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DUp06CryWQpE) ### Comment Username: @Grandpat-Star > When I try to watch the official music video for Strawberry Wine by Deana Carter Official the adblock has not worked since last night. I have tried reloading and ads show up. comment.body:
>I thought Safari Extension is supporting #$# rules.

As far as I know, it does.
I'm not sure, but in this case it might be related to - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/SafariConverterLib/issues/40

These rules may also work:
```adblock
animefillerlist.com#$#body { overflow: visible !important; }
animefillerlist.com#$#body div.fc-ab-root:not(#style_important) { display: none !important; }
```
